1 12/01/2020                            NYS DIVISION OF HOUSING AND COMMUNITY RENEWAL                              TITLE PAGE
  02:47:33                                      OFFICE OF RENT ADMINISTRATION                                      HUBC137

                                      MAJOR CAPITAL IMPROVEMENT AND TAX ABATEMENT CASES


               REPORT DESCRIPTION  : THIS REPORT WILL LIST MAJOR CAPITAL IMPROVEMENT (OM) AND TAX
                                     ABATEMENT (X) CASES FOR A SELECTED COUNTY.  ALL OPEN CASES
                                     AND CASES THAT HAVE BEEN CLOSED SINCE THE SPECIFIED DATE WILL
                                     BE LISTED.

               SELECTION CRITERIA  : COUNTY CODE  - 63
                                     CASE STATUS  - ALL
                                     BEGIN DATE   - 01/01/2010
                                     END DATE     - 11/30/2020

               DEFINITION OF TERMS : BLDG ID         - A UNIQUE NUMBER ASSIGNED TO A BUILDING
                                     BLDG ADDRESS    - THE ADDRESS OF THE BUILDING
                                     LAST REG        - THE YEAR OF THE MOST RECENT REGISTRATION
                                     RC CNT          - NUMBER OF RENT CONTROLLED APARTMENTS FROM THE
                                                       MOST RECENT REGISTRATION
                                     DOCKET NO       - A UNIQUE IDENTIFIER ASSIGNED TO A CASE AT THE
                                                       TIME IT IS ENTERED INTO HUTS
                                     CASE TYPE       - THE CLASSIFICATION UNDER WHICH THE CASE WAS
                                                       FILED
                                     CASE STATUS     - CURRENT STATUS OF A CASE (OPEN/CLOSED)
                                     FILING DATE     - THE DATE A CASE WAS RECEIVED BY THE DIVISION
                                                       OF HOUSING
                                     CLOSING DATE    - DATE THE CASE WAS CLOSED (IF APPLICABLE)
                                     CLOSE CODE      - DETERMINATION OF A CLOSED CASE
                                     STAFF ID        - IDENTIFIER OF STAFF PERSON ASSIGNED TO THE CASE
                                     MCI ITEM        - ITEM THAT WAS IMPROVED
                                     CLAIM COST      - AMOUNT SPENT ON MCI ITEM
                                     ALLOW COST      - AMOUNT ALLOWED FOR MCI ITEM
                                     WK BEG DT       - DATE WORK BEGAN ON MCI ITEM

               REPORT CONVENTIONS  : UPPER LEFT HAND CORNER   - DATE & TIME THE PROGRAM WAS RUN
                                     UPPER RIGHT HAND CORNER  - PAGE NUMBER & PROGRAM NAME

               SORT ORDER          : BUILDING ADDRESS - STREET NUMBER WITHIN STREET NAME

               TOTALS              : NUMBER OF MCI ("OM") CASES LISTED
                                     NUMBER OF TAX ABATEMENT ("X") CASES LISTED
                                     TOTAL CASES LISTED














  * PREPARED BY THE OFFICE OF HOUSING INFORMATION SYSTEMS
